ISSUE.TITLE: Increase character limit for storing secrets
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently, the character limit for storing secrets in Gitness repositories is 1024 characters. This limit is proving to be quite restrictive for projects that require secure storage of sensitive information such as API keys, passwords, and tokens. Currently, I am splitting one long secret into multiple secrets and then merging them into one inside the pipeline, this is not the optimal solution and there should be a straightforward way of using long secrets. So can we increase this limit using some configs? Or is there an existing way to add a long string? If not I would like to submit a PR for this change.
